headline: Is PNC Financial (PNC) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After Strong Multi Year Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether PNC Financial Services Group is fairly priced or offering value at today's share price, you are not alone. The stock most recently closed at US$225.49, with returns of 6.2% over 7 days, 5.9% over 30 days, 6.6% year to date, 19.1% over 1 year, 58.7% over 3 years, and 87.1% over 5 years. These performance figures will naturally shape how investors think about risk and potential upside. Recent attention on PNC Financial Services Group has focused on how its share...
